product_name: Oboz Sawtooth Low BDry Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Oboz Sawtooth Low BDry women's hiking shoes may be the most-used hiking shoes in your closet. Heck, they probably won't even make it to the closet. Nubuck leather leather uppers combine with abrasion resistant textile to stand-up to regular use on rugged trails. Oboz BDry waterproof, breathable membranes keep water out so your feet stay dry and comfortable. Anatomic EVA footbeds and dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning over a long day of hiking. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability and protection underfoot, increasing surefootedness on varied terrain. Oboz Sawtooth Low BDry hiking shoes have injection-molded heel counters that lock feet in to deliver technical-yet-nimble performance. Aggressively lugged outsoles use a durable, sticky rubber for exceptional grip in all directions on both wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: The Oboz Sawtooth Low BDry women's hiking shoes may be the most-used hiking shoes in your closet. Heck, they probably won't even make it to the closet.
